content.en: Cryptographic hardware optimization: Researchers are exploring ways to enhance the features of assurance and certification in resource-constrained devices for cryptographic algorithms. They are using field program gate arrays (FPGAs) to build cryptographic algorithms on hardware platforms. Another area of focus is improving the signature speed of the Elliptic Curve Digital Signature Algorithm (ECDSA) by implementing it on FPGAs. Additionally, researchers are developing compact and efficient hardware implementations of various cryptographic algorithms for IoT applications.
content.da: Kryptografisk hardwareoptimering: Forskere undersøger måder at forbedre funktionerne af sikkerhed og certificering i ressourcebegrænsede enheder til kryptografiske algoritmer. De bruger Field Programmable Gate Arrays (FPGAs) til at bygge kryptografiske algoritmer på hardwareplatforme. Et andet fokusområde er at forbedre signaturhastigheden for Elliptic Curve Digital Signature Algorithm (ECDSA) ved at implementere den på FPGAs. Derudover udvikler forskere kompakte og effektive hardwareimplementeringer af forskellige kryptografiske algoritmer til IoT-applikationer.
